colorScheme.description: The visual color appearance of the component.

crossOrigin.description:
The key used to set the crossOrigin on the HTMLImageElement into which the image will be loaded.
This tells the browser to request cross-origin access when trying to download the image data.

format.description: Function to get the initials to display.

ignoreFallback.description: If `true`, opt out of the avatar's `fallback` logic and renders the `img` at all times.

name.description:
The name of the person in the avatar.

- If `src` has loaded, the name will be used as the `alt` attribute of the `img`
- If `src` is not loaded, the name will be used to create the initials

referrerPolicy.description: Defining which referrer is sent when fetching the resource.

src.description: The image url of the avatar.

srcSet.description: List of sources to use for different screen resolutions.

max.description: The maximum number of visible avatars.

ping.description: If `true`, make an element scale and fade like a radar ping or ripple of water.

pingColor.description: It is used for the color of the ping animation.

pingCount.description: It is used for the count of the ping animation.

pingDuration.description: It is used for the duration of the ping animation.

pingScale.description: It is used for the scale of the ping animation.
